title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the core CLI and server to pull and run large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library offering a simple client for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as a chat or LLM component.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama WebUI Community)
summary: Feature-rich web interface for Ollama with chat history, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for integrating Ruby applications with the Ollama server.

title: ollama-cli (node)
summary: Lightweight Node CLI wrapper that simplifies pulling and chatting with models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style autocomplete and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with both REST and gRPC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama and WebUI containers together.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node selection.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform Flutter desktop app for managing and chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-kotlin-sdk
summary: Multiplatform Kotlin SDK for JVM, Android, and native targets with coroutines support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library used internally by Ollama CLI, exposing chat, pull, and generate endpoints.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama and common models for reproducible deployments on NixOS.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama-based model fields, admin chat widgets, and REST endpoints.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service template exposing OpenAI-compatible endpoints backed by local Ollama models.
